page.title: 11MANCETTER HILL FARM
page.content:
Mr Reed is the tenant farmer of Mancetter Hill Farm. The farm is part of the Merevale Estate. Mr. Reed has 180 acres of Grade 4 agricultural land. He starts work at 6.30 am and end at 6.30 pm. He works seven days a week for the whole year.
The farm buildings are a mixture of old and new. The farm house was built in 1739, the brick barns are 100 yrs old. The Milking Parlour and Dairy are new. There are also Dutch barns and Cattle sheds.
Mr Reed grows Wheat and Oats. The grassland is used for Silage, grazing and Hay. He uses many kinds of modern machinery - Sprayer, Harrow, Rollers, Combine harvester and muck spreader.
